meanings.definition: The act of making something better.
meanings.sent1: Her improvement in math was noticeable after extra practice.
meanings.sent2: The city saw an improvement in air quality after implementing new regulations.
meanings.sent3: The improvement in his cooking skills was so great that even the dog wanted a taste.
meanings.sent4: Her improvement in painting was like watching a black-and-white photo turn into a colorful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The improvement in her grades was like a flower blooming in the desert.

meanings.definition: A change for the better; progress.
meanings.sent1: The team's improvement in teamwork led to their success.
meanings.sent2: The improvement in his health was evident after he started exercising regularly.
meanings.sent3: His improvement in dancing made him the star of the party.
meanings.sent4: The improvement in her mood was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The improvement in his attitude was like a refreshing breeze on a hot summer day.

meanings.definition: An increase or enhancement in quality or value.
meanings.sent1: The improvement in the restaurant's service made customers happy.
meanings.sent2: The improvement in technology has made communication faster and easier.
meanings.sent3: The improvement in his jokes made everyone laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The improvement in her voice was like listening to an angel sing.
meanings.sent5: The improvement in his skills was like adding a touch of magic to his work.
